AddEntities(IEnumerable<Entity>)
AddEntitiesIgnoringDuplicate(IEnumerable<Entity>)

Used for situations when some children may be new but others may not be. For example a dropped InventoryEntity turns into a WorldEntity but keeps its battery inside (already known).
